last_episode_to_air.name: Transformations
last_episode_to_air.overview: The computer-generated Doctor Morocco hatches a bold new plot to defeat the Rescue Bots by becoming one of them.

name: Transformers: Rescue Bots
overview: A team of specialized Autobots not quite ready for prime-time battles against the Decepticons is given a vital mission by Optimus Prime. The goal for the Bots is to learn about mankind and how to help others to find out what it really means to be a hero.

episodes.name: Family of Heroes
episodes.overview: The four members of Rescue Force Sigma-17 emerge and are greeted by the Autobot leader Optimus Prime, who assigns them to work with the Burns family on an island. While the four are supposed to respond to every command the humans give them, they get fed up with it and are tempted to leave Earth. Until, an animatronic dinosaur attacks the island.

episodes.name: Under Pressure
episodes.overview: While Chase and Chief Burns pursue an out-of-control robo-landscaper through Griffin Rock, Cody Burns reports that the rest of the team might be delayed, as his siblings are having trouble coming to terms with the fact that their rescue vehicles are alien robots. A volcano suddenly threatens the island of Griffin Rock, sending the Rescue Bots and Burns family into action. The group has to put aside their differences and work together in order to save the island.

episodes.name: Flobsters on Parade
episodes.overview: Flying lobsters invade a summer festival, and an angry Heatwave refuses to help fight them.

episodes.name: The Alien Invasion of Griffin Rock
episodes.overview: The Rescue Bots are put in danger when a resident of Griffin Rock threatens to expose the secret of an "alien invasion.

episodes.name: Walk on the Wild Side
episodes.overview: Boulder decides that the team needs an animal mascot but maybe a zoo isn't the best place to find one.

episodes.name: Cody on Patrol
episodes.overview: Cody accidentally unleashes a swarm of futuristic nanites while he's trying to super-charge his go-kart to help in the team's rescue missions.

episodes.name: Four Bots and a Baby
episodes.overview: The Bots are enlisted to watch after Doc Greene's Robo-Baby.

episodes.name: Christmas in July
episodes.overview: Cody, his family and the Rescue Bots have to stop a snow storm in July when a weather machine goes haywire.

episodes.name: Deep Trouble
episodes.overview: A shark targeting high-tech ocean equipment is spotted off the Griffin Rock shore.

episodes.name: The Other Doctor
episodes.overview: A scientist tries to replace the team with a new invention, leaving everyone out of the action.

episodes.name: The Reign of Morocco
episodes.overview: Cody looks for proof that the new scientist's invention is really a villainous plan.

episodes.name: Small Blessings
episodes.overview: The Rescue Bots are accidentally shrunk and the Burns family must work without their partners.

episodes.name: The Griffin Rock Triangle
episodes.overview: Cody finds a clue to an old mystery and makes a startling underwater discovery.

episodes.name: Rules and Regulations
episodes.overview: The Rescue Bots disobey the Chief's orders and find themselves in a life-threatening situation.

episodes.name: The Lost Bell
episodes.overview: A storm strands Cody on a deserted island where they find a pirate ship that holds the key to a mystery.

episodes.name: Bumblebee to the Rescue
episodes.overview: Bumblebee pays the Rescue Bots a visit just in time to help investigate a mysterious meteor.

episodes.name: You've Been Squilshed
episodes.overview: The Bots and Burns must stop a giant glob of space slime before it consumes the town.

episodes.name: Countdown
episodes.overview: Cody and the Rescue Bots try to solve the vanishing mystery when the residents of Griffin Rock start disappearing.

episodes.name: The Haunting of Griffin Rock
episodes.overview: Ghosts haunt and terrorize the residents of Griffin Rock.

episodes.name: Little White Lies
episodes.overview: The kids are covertly planning a surprise birthday party for their father. Chief Burns tells them he is heading to the docks, but actually takes a trip to the bakery for a cake, as a present for his family, thinking that they forgot his birthday. Chase discovers this to be a lie and is confounded by this. While setting up the party back home, the kids and the other Rescue Bots realize that Chase and Chief Burns are missing, and search the entire town. Eventually they discover the two trapped inside an underground mine, and save them from the flooding water and falling rocks.

episodes.name: Shake Up
episodes.overview: The Rescue Bots lead the rescue efforts when a series of earthquakes strike the island.

episodes.name: Rescue Boy
episodes.overview: Doc Greene invents a repulsor badge that allows the wearer to be occluded from projectiles. Cody uses it to participate more on the front lines, in missions with the rest of his family, against Chief Burns concern of his safety. His superhero status, however, is halted when his repulsor badge is overloaded and projects a nonstop field, enclosing him inside. Boulder uses neutralizing gloves, also invented by Doc Greene, to bypass the repulsive field and successfully remove the badge from Cody, shortly before it detonates.

episodes.name: It's a Bot Time
episodes.overview: When Doc Greene's experiment with a time machine goes awry, the Bots end up being captured by an old nemesis.

episodes.name: Bot to the Future
episodes.overview: When the Bots return home, they find that Doctor Morocco is in command of Griffin Rock.

episodes.name: Road Trip
episodes.overview: With the Rescue Bots' secret now known to Frankie and Doc, Cody has to deal with a new family dynamic as well as an unpredictable teleportation device.

episodes.name: Sky Forest
episodes.overview: Frankie's contest entry not only threatens her friendship with Cody and the Bots, but the safety of the entire island.

episodes.name: One for the Ages
episodes.overview: Experimental technology turns Cody into a grown-up, affecting his standing in the family and on the rescue team.

episodes.name: Tip of the Iceberg
episodes.overview: A mysterious iceberg off the coast of Griffin Rock brings both danger and the interest of an old nemesis.

episodes.name: A Virtual Disaster
episodes.overview: The virtual becomes real. Heatwave realizes Blades's potential as a true hero.

episodes.name: Spellbound
episodes.overview: The Bots and the Burnses are in mind-controlled stupors. Cody scrambles to snap them out of it before he's sucked in.

episodes.name: Prescott's Bots
episodes.overview: The Team is forced to participate in a reality show that captures extreme danger on camera.

episodes.name: Blame the Gremlins
episodes.overview: Kade's nightmares come to life and threaten Griffin Rock and Cody and the Rescue Bots must help.

episodes.name: Feed the Beast
episodes.overview: While trying to hunt it down, Cody and the Bots discover the legendary Maine Ridge Monster is closer than they thought.

episodes.name: What Lies Below
episodes.overview: Cody's Uncle Woodrow pays a visit, resulting in the entire Rescue Team (along with Optimus Prime) going on an unexpected mission below the surface of the earth.

episodes.name: What Rises Above
episodes.overview: Stuck underground and separated, the Rescue Bots and the Burnses, teamed with Optimus Prime, must regroup and work together to escape a primeval world of strange creatures.

episodes.name: Space Bots
episodes.overview: When an experimental Space Elevator strands Doc and Graham in orbit, the Rescue Bots dust off their old ship and attempt a risky rescue.

episodes.name: The Island of Misfit Tech
episodes.overview: Cody and the Bots are led on an adventure to an island filled with dangerous technology.

episodes.name: The Vigilant Town
episodes.overview: The new computer designed to keep Griffin Rock safe becomes dangerous.

episodes.name: Buddy System
episodes.overview: The Rescue Team goes on a nature hike; escaped snakes reek havoc in Griffin Rock.

episodes.name: In Search of the Griffin's Nest
episodes.overview: Cody and the Rescue Bots go on a quest to find the mythical Griffin's nest.

episodes.name: Bots and Robbers
episodes.overview: Chase goes rogue on an undercover mission as the Bots and Burns family do their best to save the island without using any modern technology.

episodes.name: Rescue Dog
episodes.overview: Cody and the Bots find a stray dog who ends up joining the rescue team, but Priscilla Pynch has other plans for the pet.

episodes.name: Changes
episodes.overview: Doctor Morocco learns a devastating secret that threatens the Rescue Bots' mission, but Optimus Prime guides Heatwave to acquire a surprising new ability.

episodes.name: Movers and Shakers
episodes.overview: The Rescue Team has to take action when rogue technology goes underground.

episodes.name: Odd Bot Out
episodes.overview: When Bumblebee partners up with Dani on a mission, Blades feels left out.

episodes.name: The Griffin Rock Express
episodes.overview: A mysterious superhero keeps a close eye on Griffin Rock while the Rescue Team rebuilds a train tunnel.

episodes.name: Double Villainy
episodes.overview: A plan is hatched by Griffin Rock's most evil villains to destroy the island and kidnap the Bots.

episodes.name: Rise of the Heroes
episodes.overview: The Bots are made to believe the Burnses are their enemies after they're wiped of their memories.

episodes.name: Land Before Prime
episodes.overview: After discovering an island of dinosaurs, Optimus must embrace his primal side.

episodes.name: Big Game
episodes.overview: Optimus Prime's new Dinosaur Mode becomes the target of a big game hunter.

episodes.name: Too Many Kades
episodes.overview: Cody and the Rescue Bots show Kade a valuable lesson in teamwork after Doc's imaging chamber creates exact replicas of him.

episodes.name: Phantom of the Sea
episodes.overview: The Rescue Bots and the Burns family get on a ghost ship that emerges once every ten years.

episodes.name: Unfinished Business
episodes.overview: Recalling a mission left unaccomplished prior to their arrival on Earth, Chase and Boulder return to space to complete the rescue.

episodes.name: No Place Like Dome
episodes.overview: When Doc creates a giant dome to shield Griffin Rock from a hurricane, he inadvertently gives the Vigilant Computer a second chance to "protect" the island.

episodes.name: Bugs in the System
episodes.overview: Doctor Morocco proves that even small pests can pose dangerous threats to Griffin Rock.

episodes.name: Switcheroo Effect
episodes.overview: A space nebula causes the Rescue Bots and Burns family to switch personalities.

episodes.name: The Riders of Midwinter
episodes.overview: The Rescue Bots take on new responsibilities during a terrible snowstorm.

episodes.name: Bot-Tastic Voyage
episodes.overview: Kade accidentally ingests microscopic cleaning robots and the Rescue Bots must go on an inner space voyage to save him.

episodes.name: Quarry's Quarry
episodes.overview: Colonel Quarry seeks additional robotic dinosaurs from Doc, so Heatwave, Chase, and Blades transform into DinoBots.

episodes.name: Chief Woodrow
episodes.overview: While Charlie Burns is away at a Police Conference, Woodrow Burns returns to watch over the rest of the Burns Family. Woodrow then takes command of the Rescue Bots team without the entire Burns Family knowing about it where they have trouble with his cooking that involves things he made in the rainforest. After Woodrow's successful rescue strategy save Mayor Luskey's boat, Mayor Luskey makes Woodrow the acting police chief where he eventually helps the Rescue Bots when some beacons Mayor Luskey was using to improve the Dolphin Wonder Festival gets some dolphins stuck in Griffin Rock's wetlands.

episodes.name: Did You See What I Thaw?
episodes.overview: The Bots discover a caveman preserved in ice and attempt to help him adjust to modern life.

episodes.name: The Attack of Humungado
episodes.overview: Monsters from Kade's favorite movie materialize; it's up to the Dino Bots to corral the Kaiju.

episodes.name: Thieves Like Us
episodes.overview: On the first day of Spring, the Burns Family and the Rescue Bots stop a mudslide. Mayor Luskey establishes Bot Appreciation Day where anyone who attends will each get a miniature action figure made by Doc Greene's 3-D printer. When Myles and Evan reprogram the action figures to steal for them, the Rescue Bots must deal with the action figures while the Burns Family is stuck at sea due to the kelp and the poisonous jellyfish.

episodes.name: Time After Time
episodes.overview: A renovated clock tower causes Cody to relive the same morning over and over.

episodes.name: Pirates Ahoy
episodes.overview: The Rescue Team is suspended when evidence arises that the Burnses are pirate descendants.

episodes.name: Turning the Tide
episodes.overview: An old friend of Optimus arrives to train the Bots in ocean rescues.

episodes.name: The Last of Morocco
episodes.overview: Dr. Morocco's best friend, famous writer Jules Verne, travels through time to find him.

episodes.name: The New Recruits
episodes.overview: The Rescue Bots find they have new recruits to train, but these newbies are hiding a dark secret.

episodes.name: Rescue Bots Academy
episodes.overview: Cody and the Rescue Bots must teach Blurr and Salvage everything they need to know.

episodes.name: A New Hero
episodes.overview: A solar flare knocks out power in Griffin Rock; Blurr deserts the Rescue Bots and steals the ship.

episodes.name: Four-Legged Hero
episodes.overview: Cyber-Dog Servo puts the Rescue Bots' undercover status in jeopardy.

episodes.name: Endangered Species
episodes.overview: The Bots go to extremes to protect endangered woodpeckers discovered by Boulder.

episodes.name: More than Meets the Eye
episodes.overview: An injured Chase uncovers many mysteries while Doc's magician sister visits Griffin Rock.

episodes.name: I Have Heard the Robots Singing
episodes.overview: Priscilla Pynch's theft of Doc's latest invention causes the entire populace of Griffin Rock to erupt into an endless musical.

episodes.name: Now and Then
episodes.overview: The Island of Griffin Rock vanishes from the ocean.

episodes.name: Today and Forever
episodes.overview: In order to save Griffin Rock, the Rescue Bots must make the ultimate sacrifice.

episodes.name: New Normal
episodes.overview: Three years after we last saw our heroes, an alien attack forces the Rescue Bots to make a decision as to whether to reveal their true natures to the citizens of Griffin Rock.

episodes.name: Bridge Building
episodes.overview: The citizens of Griffin Rock are deciding whether or not to let the Bots stay in their midst when a GroundBridge accident splits the team.

episodes.name: Arrivals
episodes.overview: As Frankie struggles to adjust to life with her baby sister, the Bots are surprised by a new arrival of their own.

episodes.name: Plus One
episodes.overview: When Heatwave invites her to take a turn at leadership, Quickshadow upsets the Rescue Team's dynamic.

episodes.name: Back to Virtual Reality
episodes.overview: When Chief is convinced by Cody to try a virtual reality video game, an old nemesis is uncovered; the team must stop the villain from destroying the real Griffin Rock.

episodes.name: Vanishing Returns
episodes.overview: The Bots deal with a group of investors who want to build a vacation resort in Griffin Rock, while Cody deals with feeling invisible around everyone.

episodes.name: Ghost in the Machine
episodes.overview: As Griffin Rock celebrates its version of Halloween, Evan and Myles car-jack Quickshadow and discover the Bots' secret.

episodes.name: Enemy of My Enemy
episodes.overview: When the Rescue Bots are captured by a new villain, the Burns family finds an unexpected ally in a former enemy.

episodes.name: Mayor May Not
episodes.overview: The town of Griffin Rock gets more than it bargained for when Chase is elected as the new mayor.

episodes.name: All Spark Day
episodes.overview: During a Cybertronian holiday, the Rescue Bots take on their biggest challenge yet - a super-sized, overtired baby.

episodes.name: Part-Time Heroes
episodes.overview: When Griffin Rock's communication tower needs replacing, the Bots and Burnses take on part-time jobs to raise the money.

episodes.name: The More Things Change...
episodes.overview: The Rescue Team struggles with last minute preparations as they finally open the mainland Training Center.

episodes.name: The More Things Stay the Same
episodes.overview: The Bots' Mainland Training Center is in danger of being discovered and, to make matters worse, the Rescue Team is trapped inside with a glitching hologram.

episodes.name: Hot Rod Bot
episodes.overview: Blurr is torn between his desire to be a winning racecar and a working Rescue Bot; Dani helps Blurr find balance.

episodes.name: King Burns
episodes.overview: Chief helps Woodrow rescue gorillas from a volcanic eruption; his sons learn they are heirs to the throne of Griffin Rock.

episodes.name: Pizza Pi Party
episodes.overview: While at Griffin Rock's Pizza Pi Festival, Doc's new super-yeast causes chaos and the Bots have to find an unconventional solution to the rising problem.

episodes.name: Uninvited Guest
episodes.overview: When Bumblebee makes an unexpected appearance at the Bots' Training Center, he brings along more than a few surprises for the team.

episodes.name: Camp Cody
episodes.overview: When Blades is unable to participate in a Lad Pioneer leveling up ceremony on the mainland due to his Bot form, Graham and Cody help disguise him.

episodes.name: Once Upon a Time
episodes.overview: The Rescue Team is drawn into the woods to solve the mystery of what's making the Griffin Spruces fall.

episodes.name: The Need for Speed
episodes.overview: A mysterious criminal and unexpected visitor challenge Blurr's future as a Rescue Bot.

episodes.name: Cody's 11
episodes.overview: Energon and technology have fallen into treacherous hands and it is up to the Burns family and their Bots to steal them back.

episodes.name: A Brush with Danger
episodes.overview: Kade's idol, an arrogant movie star, comes to Griffin Rock in preparation for a role, causing trouble for the Rescue Team while they try to solve a series of mysterious break-ins.

episodes.name: To Infinity... And Back
episodes.overview: When Dani's out-of-this-world test flight doesn't go according to plan, the Rescue Team strives to ensure she makes it back home.

episodes.name: Family Business
episodes.overview: Cody rides along with each of the Bots to decide what kind of rescue worker he wants to be.

episodes.name: Upgrades
episodes.overview: When Optimus Prime splits the Rescue Bots into different teams for new assignments, the evil genius Doctor Morocco returns to wreak havoc.

episodes.name: Transformations
episodes.overview: The computer-generated Doctor Morocco hatches a bold new plot to defeat the Rescue Bots by becoming one of them.
